title: Grey-Green Needled Herb Plant
name: Rosemary Plant
description: A fragrant grey-green plant with needle-like leaves and tiny purple flowers. Grows sturdy and well-maintained.
reveals: Found growing in the Montrose garden.

character_interpretations.professor: Rosemary. Common herb with good circulatory properties. A choice that suggests someone was trying to help with cardiac health.
character_interpretations.baker: Rosemary from the garden. Fragrant, strong flavor. A helpful herb.
character_interpretations.heiress: Rosemary grows wild here. I didn't know it was medicinal.
character_interpretations.explorer: Rosemary. Mediterranean origin, grows reliably in this climate. Been here for years.
